section.name: Folder tabulation panel
section.span: What and where is the folder tabulation panel?

div.p: About to click the document 'multibazar2009' in the folder tabulation panel. This document is one of the two documents in folder 'newspaper', which is the current folder, being selected in the folder navigation panel.

section.p:
The folder tabulation panel is the panel where the content of the current folder is tabulated. The 'name' column of this table gives the names of all items of content while the other columns give more information on each item: In the first column an icon indicates the type of the item and in the third column an icon indicates the state of the item: if it is published on the web or not.
